channel.title: Mtp (source) server... help please!
channel.description: :( after a very long time of trying to make the MTP SOURCE SERVER a spawn server, i could not do it... So i decided that i need your help so I can finish my server and everyone can play and have fun as just a pk server. So here is what i need help with to make it, so either right as a player logs on there Membership, or Donator = 2 so they can use the donator shop i want it to auto set there donator, or membership ALSO IS THERE A WAY TO EDIT THE DONATOR SHOP TO MAKE IT SO ANY ONE CAN BUY ITEMS FROM THE DONATOR SHOP? AND If i can't do thAT i want to put dragon claws in the pk shop, and set all the items in the pk shop to 0 pk points HOW DO I DO THAT? IF THERE IS CODE, CAN YOU GIVE ME THE CODE PLEASE? CAN YOU HELP FIND WHERE I FIND THE FOLDER TO CHANGE PRICES, AND WHERE TO PUT IN THE ITEM ID IF THAT IS HOW YOU DO IT =O.. I REALLY NEED HELP, THIS SERVER WOULD BE GREAT IF SOMEONE HELPED ME WITH JUST THIS PART... SO PLEASE FEEL FREE TO HELP ME THANKS VERY MUCH.

item.title: Mtp (source) server... help please!
item.dc:creator: @help_with_my_server help with my server
item.description:
@help_with_my_server wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:4, topic:365838”][quote author=help with my server link=topic=462034.msg3379952#msg3379952 date=1287947818]

I don’t know what MTP is, and caps lock isn’t that necessary. Also in the donator shop code there should be something such as,

if (Donator == 1) {
//yadyayda
} else {
// go away etc
}
}

Just change that too 0. Unless they’ve done it another way, not too sure.
[/quote] MTP server is a source server from the download list, its code its some what different, this is why I am having trouble.
I apologies for the caps lock, I just wanted the most important parts to be bolded, anyways I’m having trouble with what you said…
Mostly because I have no idea where to find the folder where the donator shop is.

Well, yes. I grasped the fact it’s up for download. I mean, what deob is it? Is it Delta, PI if so?[/quote] here is a picture, you can see your self that it is almost a 474… Although it has 317 graphix or gfx, I’ll assume the server is a PI because delta has bad gfx… click the picture to see it bigger.

Read full topic

Well, yes. I grasped the fact it’s up for download. I mean, what deob is it? Is it Delta, PI if so?

item.title: Mtp (source) server... help please!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I don’t know what MTP is, and caps lock isn’t that necessary. Also in the donator shop code there should be something such as,

if (Donator == 1) {
//yadyayda
} else {
// go away etc
}
}

Just change that too 0. Unless they’ve done it another way, not too sure. Also, if this is a 317 then go to player.java and edit the value off Donator to 1 by default.

Read full topic

item.title: Mtp (source) server... help please!
item.dc:creator: @help_with_my_server help with my server
item.description:
@help_with_my_server wrote:

after a very long time of trying to make the MTP SOURCE SERVER a spawn server, i could not do it…
So i decided that i need your help so I can finish my server and everyone can play and have fun as just a pk server.
So here is what i need help with to make it, so either right as a player logs on there Membership, or Donator = 2 so they can use the donator shop i want it to auto set there donator, or membership ALSO IS THERE A WAY TO EDIT THE DONATOR SHOP TO MAKE IT SO ANY ONE CAN BUY ITEMS FROM THE DONATOR SHOP?
AND If i can’t do thAT i want to put dragon claws in the pk shop, and set all the items in the pk shop to 0 pk points HOW DO I DO THAT?
IF THERE IS CODE, CAN YOU GIVE ME THE CODE PLEASE?
CAN YOU HELP FIND WHERE I FIND THE FOLDER TO CHANGE PRICES, AND WHERE TO PUT IN THE ITEM ID IF THAT IS HOW YOU DO IT =O…
I REALLY NEED HELP, THIS SERVER WOULD BE GREAT IF SOMEONE HELPED ME WITH JUST THIS PART…
SO PLEASE FEEL FREE TO HELP ME THANKS VERY MUCH.
